author: VinInn
body:
same as #14057 + consistent use of double.
This cause regression (see comments in code)
http://innocent.home.cern.ch/innocent/regress/pu35_SpeedMoreHLT3/

the other change uses a more correct algorithm in Basic2DGenericPFlowPositionCalc
which on the other hand does not produce a major speedup (timing dominated by the doble precision log)
title: speed up avoiding eta phi computations
